Title: Lights of Winter
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Tom Szentgyorgyi, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by), Philip Buiser (story editor)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norman and his new friend have an adventure; Norma experiences her first taste of real happiness in some time during an annual festival in White Pine Bay; Dylan becomes caught between two families.
